education.area: Cognitive Science with Specialization in Computing, Philosophy

projects.name: Structural MRI analysis of subcortical nuclei
projects.summary: Computational morphometry using FSL to examine structural variability of subcortical nuclei as a function of behavior using the Human Connectome Project database

projects.name: Deductive reasoning and language
projects.summary: Behavioral and neurostimulation (TMS) experiment to dissociate deductive reasoning and language

publications.name: Dissociating language and thought in human reasoning
publications.summary: A neuromodulation study to dissociate language and deductive reasoning.

teaching.summary: Non-profit educational organization for accessible, autonomous, and exciting learning and teaching experiences.
